stu_tags: EXTRA CREDIT  RESPECTED  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: Professor Tryhane is a awesome professor. He knows a lot about business and working in corporate America. What most most helpful about this class was that he teaches you how to write a resume and helps you make a plan for reaching your education and career goals. Professor Tryhane\'s class was a welcomed relief from my harder classes.

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Participation matters (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Respected (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Caring (1)
comments: I took Professor Tryhane for BUS 300 and ACCT 301. ACCT 301 is very challenging but he will always help you and has good office hours if you have any questions! He has been my favorite Professor through my entire college career and I will try to take his classes still! You will have to work hard for an A but he will help you if you need it!

comments: Prof. Tryhane I think was a very simple teacher for his online class. You have a discussion or two each week as well as 2 HW assignments and two quizzes. Maybe an extra HW assignment as well. So that all took roughly 2-3 hours a week to finish. I think I would have rather taken his on grounds class because he seems like an interesting teacher.

comments: I took Professor Tryhane\'s online class, so I can\'t speak for his personality or anything, but what I saw of him: he is a nice guy but almost absent during an online class, homework is fairly easy and clear but watch out for the business plan, 20% of your grade and he gives little instruction for what he expects. Work hard and you\'ll get an A.

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Participation matters (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Respected (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Caring (1)
comments: The book and modules we used didn\'t give examples remotely close to the actual homework. When I asked him to explain a problem he just sent the solutions. Confusing class, and I work in an accounting office.

comments: Be very careful in this online class. The program itself is poorly designed, asks you to do tasks such as "Enter the debit accounts in alphabetical order and enter the credit accounts in alphabetical order.", and "Only round final answers to the nearest whole dollar. Do not round during steps in the calculations." Oh, and the teacher knows the auth

comments: The professor seemed like he was helpful and understanding, he has a sense of humor and is friendly. However, when it comes down to ACTUALLY helping his students, he extremely lacked. Just because it\'s an online class doesn\'t mean it\'s okay to "check out". When I asked for help I was told, and I quote, "I will let you figure out what you need."

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Participation matters (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Respected (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Professor Tryhane has been the best teacher that I have had at FLC so far.I loved his teaching style. I learned a lot and highly recommend taking his classes. He is a very realistic person and understands that things in life do come up, and is understanding. Wish he taught more subjects!

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Participation matters (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Respected (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Caring (1)
comments: BUS300 on-campus was overall a good class. The professor\'s strong point is accounting and was able to teach this class well. The course seemed more like a 4 unit course with the amount of homework and projects but the point was to learn and I did. The professor was very fair, wanted students to do well, utilized time well, and offered extra credit.

comments: If your taking online acct301 this is the Professor to take. He uses AMEengage website which is very intuitive and makes learning the material easy. Professor responds to emails quickly and keeps you up to date.

comments: He didn\'t seem very focused on his online class and all the papers and instructions were more geared towards the on ground class. Lots of weekly hw and reading both on a publishers website and on d2l.

comments: Teacher seems to be nice, but the online course is annoying. Maybe accounting isn\'t for me, but there are not enough examples in the book so you\'re stuck guessing on parts of the online homework. Work book doesn\'t help because there are no answer and you have no idea if your doing it right.. Tuff luck getting an A even if your a great student

comments: Teacher is terrible. To be expected from a lazy online course teacher. He did not even get the syllabus right, and had to correct it halfway through the semester. He is also bias when choosing who he allows to either add class or who gets late exceptions which is to be expected because the world is not fair. Just do work and you will pass

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Participation matters (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Respected (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Caring (1)
comments: homework assignment takes roughly 2 hours every week, 2 quizzes every week, 4 unit exams . Must stay up to date with all assignments or will fall behind. The quizzes are based off the hw. PRINT SCREEN ALL HOMEWORK TO SAVE FOR EXAMS/FINALS. This helped me tremendously as you can\'t go back and look at your quiz answers/homework answers

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Participation matters (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Respected (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Caring (1)
comments: You have to do the homework and quizzes online before the work is discussed in class, but, it\'s all open book. Gerry is a very nice, understanding, caring teacher who wants us all and gave us all numerous chances to succeed in his class. A very very good teacher teaching a lot in 16 wks w/o overwhelming students. He also made it fun!

comments: class was hard. no explanations, he just expects you to know how to do advanced financial accounting. The course explains the basics and he expects you to do advanced stuff in the online hw. its hard to get an A in this class

comments: Good professor. Class usually kept my attention. All the homework is online, piece of cake if you spend the time to read through it. For the most part a pretty easy A. . . has lots of opportunities for extra credit.

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Participation matters (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Respected (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Not sure if Prof. Tryhane ever reads the comments on this site but he seemed better than what people say here on this web site. If he reads these comments, I hope he got better because of the feedback. He curved our third exam and D2L quizzes. It was an online class. I slacked off a little. But if I studied harder I would\'ve gotten an A.

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Participation matters (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Respected (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Took his Business 300 Online class. He waits until the last minute to write back to students, does not clarify on final project details, and does not give any input to the class at all. I\'ve taken many online classes and most of the teachers have been very helpful. He is not a helpful teacher and does not give out clear instructions on projects.

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Participation matters (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Respected (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Awesome professor! Very helpful and will work with online student issues. He wants his students to succeed and he is very approachable. I also liked the AME format that he used in the class. Highly recommended.
